name: Mayhem Above
description:
DescriptionMayhem Above is a Music Gravity Score Attack game. You are an International Space Speaker. Musical impulses are analyzed from the songs you select. Each Music impulse will give you a turbo boost that will allow you to perform more tricks and gain more score. But beware! The more musical intensity, the more enemy activity. And they will try to shut you up.Features
  • Music Reactive environment.
  • Procedural levels. Each song has a different layout.
  • Play songs from YOUR library.
  • Mesmerizing ecosystems.
  • Local Multiplayer.
  • Experience System with stats. The more you play, the more powerful your space ship will be.
